source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_00<tab>Brangwine seems in a world to herself.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_00<tab>レヴナンツトールのブラングワインに、特殊なアレキサンドライトについて相談してみよう。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_01<tab>Brangwine is more than willing to give you the flawless alexandrite her son found...in exchange for a few things. The first is a Bombard core to heat her bath, and the second is a bottle of sacred spring water for stain removal. The last is a fine brass kettle of the type fashionable in the North Shroud. Obtain all three to warm her heart.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_01<tab>レヴナンツトールのブラングワインによると、物々交換であれば、<var 28 ((Item)) F2252501 /var>を譲ってくれるという。「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254301 /var>」「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254401 /var>」「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254801 /var>」を入手し、レヴナンツトールの「ブラングワイン」に渡そう。「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254801 /var>」は、北部森林で出回っているそうだ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_02<tab>Brangwine takes what you have brought her not with a smile, but with a sigh. Though she wishes to leave Ealdwine money enough to settle down, she worries he never will have the chance. Treasure hunting is, after all, a dangerous business, and so the mother insists you make way to western La Noscea, and persuade her boy to give it up.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_02<tab>ブラングワインに依頼の品を渡したところ、もうひとつ冒険者に頼みたいことがあると言う。どうやら、彼女の息子にトレジャーハンターを辞めるよう説得してほしいようだ。西ラノシアにいる「エルドワイン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_03<tab>No less soused or stubborn than usual, Ealdwine refuses to stop treasure hunting until he finds his one, big score. Help him do so by searching Amdapor Keep, Pharos Sirius, and the Tam<var 1F /var>Tara Deepcroft for lost treasure.

※Amdapor Keep, Pharos Sirius, and the Tam<var 1F /var>Tara Deepcroft (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_03<tab>エルドワインは、一攫千金のお宝を手にするまで、トレジャーハンターを辞めないという。冒険者も、宝探しを手伝うことになった。「邪教排撃 古城アムダプール」を攻略し、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8401 /var>」を入手しよう。「怪鳥巨塔 シリウス大灯台」を攻略し、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8501 /var>」を入手しよう。「惨劇霊殿 タムタラの墓所 (Hard)」を攻略し、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8601 /var>」を入手しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_04<tab>Dirty and tired, you nevertheless now have the three treasure coffers. Return to Swiftperch so that Ealdwine might pry them open.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_04<tab>3つのお宝を入手した。スウィフトパーチ入植地の「エルドワイン」に、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8401 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8501 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8601 /var>」を渡そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_05<tab>You watch as Ealdwine lifts the lids of coffers not opened for an age...only to find worthless junk inside. Never one to lose heart for long, though, the treasure hunter lets you in on another tip: there may be another great treasure lost in the Stone Vigil. Go now and see if there is any truth to Ealdwine's claim.

※The Stone Vigil (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_05<tab>エルドワインにお宝を渡した。どれも値打ち物ではなかったらしく、エルドワインは落胆していた。次は「城塞奪回 ストーンヴィジル (Hard)」を攻略し、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8701 /var>」を入手しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_06<tab>The treasure of the Stone Vigil is lost no more. Return with it to Swiftperch, and hope that this, too, is not filled with rubbish.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_06<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8701 /var>を入手した。スウィフトパーチ入植地の「エルドワイン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8701 /var>」を渡そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_07<tab>Excited as a little boy, Ealdwine pries opens the lost treasure from the Stone Vigil. However, once again, he finds nothing but junk. Ealdwine then proclaims he cannot give up treasure hunting yet. However, so as to not to leave you completely empty-handed, he imparts the way to his mother's heart: high-quality tailor-made eel pie and a piece of perfect cloth. Obtain these and return to Revenant's Toll.

※Certain ingredients required to craft these items can be obtained by desynthesizing aged goods sold at the Silver Bazaar.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_07<tab>エルドワインにお宝を渡したが、今回も値打ち物ではなかったようだ。エルドワインからの情報を頼りに、「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252C01 /var>」と「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252D01 /var>」を入手し、レヴナンツトールの「ブラングワイン」に渡そう。製作に必要な素材の一部は、シルバーバザーで売り出されている品を分解することで得られるらしい。

source:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_08<tab>You could not fulfill your part of the bargain, and Ealdwine remains a treasure hunter. Nonetheless, Brangwine is so pleased with her eel pie and fine fabric that she gives you the piece of flawless alexandrite anyway. With patience and persistence, she reasons, she will make her son give up treasure hunting.

※If you have obtained all four items requested by Gerolt, you may return to Hyrstmill to have your Zodiac Weapon forged.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SEQ_08<tab>ブラングワインに差し入れをして、「ゾディアックウェポン」に魂を込めるための「<var 28 ((Item)) F2252501 /var>」を譲ってもらった。彼女は、息子が諦めるまで根気よく説得を続けるつもりのようだ。ゲロルトから要求されたすべての品がそろっていた場合は、ハーストミルに戻り、「ゾディアックウェポン」を再創造しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_00<tab>Deliver a Bombard core, a bottle of sacred spring water, and a brass kettle to Brangwine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_00<tab>ブラングワインに<var 28 ((Item)) F2254301 /var>と<var 28 ((Item)) F2254401 /var>と<var 28 ((Item)) F2254801 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Ealdwine in Swiftperch.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_01<tab>西ラノシアのエルドワインと話す

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_02<tab>Obtain the lost treasure from Amdapor Keep.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_02<tab>「邪教排撃 古城アムダプール」を攻略して
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8401 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_03<tab>Obtain the lost treasure from Pharos Sirius.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_03<tab>「怪鳥巨塔 シリウス大灯台」を攻略して
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8501 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_04<tab>Obtain the lost treasure from the Tam<var 1F /var>Tara Deepcroft (Hard).
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_04<tab>「惨劇霊殿 タムタラの墓所 (Hard)」を攻略して
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8601 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the lost treasures to Ealdwine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_05<tab>エルドワインに依頼品を渡す

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_06<tab>Obtain the lost treasure from the Stone Vigil (Hard).
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_06<tab>「城塞奪回 ストーンヴィジル (Hard)」を攻略して
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8701 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_07<tab>Deliver the lost treasure to Ealdwine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_07<tab>エルドワインに依頼品を渡す

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_08<tab>Deliver a tailor-made eel pie <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> and a piece of perfect cloth <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Brangwine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_TODO_08<tab>ブラングワインに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252C01 /var>と<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252D01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_000<tab>Why, if it isn't the nice <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who wanted all those maps! What brings you Brangwine's way?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_000<tab>……あら、地図の<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>。
そんな所にボーっと突っ立って、なんの用だい。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_001<tab>Alexandrite? Oh, that bit of crystal my son brought home? I've been using it to brighten up my garden, but if it means that much to you I suppose I could part with it.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_001<tab>なぁに、愚息が拾った「特別なアレキサンドライト」が欲しい？
ありゃあ、キレイだからウチの庭石に使ってたんだけどねぇ。
そんなに欲しいなら、あげてもいいわよぉ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_002<tab>Well, in exchange for a few things, anyway. It's just a few items that I have wanted for of late, and certainly nothing an adventurer like yourself should have any trouble with. Do we have a deal?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_002<tab>……ただ、ウチも生活があるからねぇ。
今回も、物々交換ってことでいいかしら？
ちょうど今、必要なものが3つあるのよぉ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_003<tab>Good! Well, the first thing I would like you to bring me is a Bombard core. I just have to drop it into the bath and presto: boiling water to soak my bones in!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_003<tab>ひとつめは「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254301 /var>」よ。
あれを冷水に浸すと、一瞬でお湯が沸くんだから！
お風呂に入る時に便利なのよぉ～。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_004<tab>Next, I should like some sacred spring water. My neighbor swears by it for getting stains out of dirty clothing.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_004<tab>それと「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254401 /var>」もお願いねぇ。
洋服のシミに効果てきめんだって、隣の奥さんに聞いたの！
私も早く、試してみたいわぁ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_005<tab>And lastly, I need a new teapot, a proper brass one. I should like something a bit easier to use than the chipped earthenware one I have now.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_005<tab>あとは「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254801 /var>」ね。
黒衣森の北部森林で出回っているっていう、
使い勝手のいいヤカンがほしいのよぉ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_006<tab>I am sure you can barter or buy Bombard cores and spring water, though I do not know where. But I do believe you are like to find metal kettles in the North Shroud.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_006<tab>全部、どこかで交換したり買ったりできるはずよぉ。
3つ揃えておばちゃんのところに持ってきてねぇ。
それじゃあ、よろしく頼むわよぉ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_010<tab>Oh my, after another bit of...alexandrite, was it? Well, you are in luck─my son just brought one home. I shall be happy to give it to you. In exchange for a few items, of course.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_010<tab>あら、またあのキラキラした庭石が欲しいの？
それなら今回も、おばちゃんと物々交換でいいかしら？

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_011<tab>The Bombard core and bottle of sacred spring water you brought were terribly useful, so I would like another one of each. Oh, and a brass kettle for good measure.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_011<tab>前回と同じ、3つの品と交換にしようかねぇ……。
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254301 /var>」「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254401 /var>」「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254801 /var>」だったわね。
どれも、とっても便利だったわよぉ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_012<tab>Old Brangwine will be here rain or shine, so just make sure to come back with all I asked for, hmmm?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_012<tab>3つ揃えたら、おばちゃんのところに持ってきてねぇ。
それじゃあ、よろしく頼むわよぉ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_040<tab>My, that was quick! Are you sure you have everything? Even the brass kettle?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_040<tab>あら、<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>。
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254301 /var>」と「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254401 /var>」と「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254801 /var>」は、
集められたかしらぁ？

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_045<tab>Deary me, aren't these lovely! Thank you, young one. <sigh> I wish I could afford to buy such goods every day. But I have been tightening the purse strings of late.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_045<tab>あらあら～ありがとうねぇ～。
最近、生活を切り詰めてギルを貯金しているから、
こういうのってとっても助かるのよぉ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_050<tab>I should like to leave my son a tidy sum after I die. Not too much, of course, but enough that he can find a home for himself.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_050<tab>……アタシが死んだあとでも、
小さい家が買えるだけのお金を、一人息子に残したくてねぇ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_051<tab>Would that my husband were alive to watch over Ealdwine after I'm gone... Yet it is better not to dwell on what could have been. <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> must set my son on his own two feet.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_051<tab>ウチは、旦那が不慮の事故で亡くなっているからねぇ、
アタシが死んだら、息子の面倒を見てくれる人がいないのよ。
まったく、息子には早く自立してもらわないと困っちゃうわ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_052<tab>Mark my words, young one: treasure hunting will not end well for him, the same as─ Well, never mind who. The point is nothing I say can convince him to give it up.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_052<tab>でも、アタシがいくら口をすっぱくして説教しても、
息子は宝探しをやめてくれないのよねぇ……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_053<tab>Hmmm... Perhaps it would carry more weight coming from an adventurer. Well, then, I have another task for you: persuade my son to stop chasing treasure.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_053<tab>そうだ、もうひとつお願いしてもいいかしら！
アンタからも、息子を説得してほしいのよぉ。
立派な冒険者に言われたら、息子も話を聞くかもしれないわ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_054<tab>He is somewhere in western La Noscea, I believe. If you can make him see the folly of his ways, then that crystal is yours.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_054<tab>息子は今、西ラノシアに探検に行っているみたい。
探しだして、宝探しをやめるよう説得してちょうだいねぇ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_060<tab>Yes, these will do nicely. Thank you. ...I am sorry if I seem curt. It's just my Ealdwine went off on yet another treasure hunt just this morning.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_060<tab>まったく、いつになったら生活が楽になるのかしら。
今朝もまた、息子は宝探しに行っちゃってねぇ……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_061<tab>Would you go and talk to him again? As best I could make out, he was bound for western La Noscea.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_061<tab>ああ、そうだわ！
息子に宝探しをやめるよう、また説得してくれない？
もう一度説得すれば、気持ちが変わるかもしれないわ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_062<tab>It would lift the worry from my mind, and perhaps another lecture will be just the thing to make him stop treasure hunting.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_062<tab>今回も、息子は西ラノシアに行っているみたい。
それじゃあ、よろしく頼むわよぉ～！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_100<tab>Day in and day out, I huntsh and I huntsh, but I've nothing to show for me troublesh. It'll be yearsh 'fore I can bring Ma any bloody cheer...
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_100<tab>探せど探せど、見つかるのはガラクタばかり……。
こんなんじゃ俺は、いつまでたっても、
母ちゃんに楽をさせてやれねぇ……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_101<tab>'Courshe, plummeting to me death won't make her lesh glum neither.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_101<tab>こ、こうなったら……
無茶を承知で、危険地帯に潜り込むしか……っ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_102<tab>Aaah! When did ye─hic!─get here!? Byregot'sh gut, I need shomethin' to shoothe me nervesh after the shtart ye gave me!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_102<tab>……ハッ！
君は、いつかの冒険者！？
ゴッ……ゴホン、立ち聞きとは相変わらず無遠慮だな！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_103<tab>Eh? Ye came on Ma'sh behalf? Hah! I'll wager─hic!─she wantsh ye to put paid to me treashure huntin' days.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_103<tab>……なに、我が母の代わりに私を説得にきた、だと……？
ふん、トレジャーハンターを辞めろと言いたいのだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_104<tab>Save yer shermon, friend─I'm not changin' me waysh. Ealdwine'sh a treashure hunter through an' through. Hellsh, I couldn't earn enough gil for watery grog if I tried me hand at shomethin' else.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_104<tab>説得や説教など無駄だ、私は絶対に……辞めない！
フン、今さらコツコツと働き出したところで、
得られる稼ぎなどたかが知れている！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_105<tab>I know in me heart o' heartsh that me one, great treashure'sh still out there! An' I ain't quittin' till I've got it!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_105<tab>私は……浪漫を追うトレジャーハンター！
一攫千金以外に、求めるべき価値などないのだ！！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_106<tab>'Courshe, no one'sh shaid I've to go it on me own... How'd ye feel about huntin' me treashure for me?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_106<tab>……そうだ、冒険者よ！
トレジャーハンターを辞めさせたいというのなら、
私の代わりに、お宝を取ってきてくれないかね！？

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_107<tab>I jusht traded me lasht pair o' socksh for a tip or three, shee? Word ish, there'sh richesh losht shomewhere in Amdapor Keep, Pharos Siriush, an'─hic!─the Tam<var 1F /var>Tara Deepcroft.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_107<tab>ハンサムと評判のこの私が、
「古城アムダプール」「シリウス大灯台」「タムタラの墓所」に、
お宝が眠っているという情報を掴んだのだ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_108<tab>Now, they're a bit too periloush for ol' Ealdwine. But a 'venturer like ye will be jusht fine, won't ye?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_108<tab>もしそこで、一攫千金の素晴らしいお宝が見つかったら、
私はトレジャーハンターを辞めると約束しよう！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_109<tab>An' if any one o' thoshe treashuresh ish big enough for me and Ma to live like kingsh, then I sholemnly shwear to give up treashure huntin'─crossh me heart!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_109<tab>……こういうのは冒険者の領分だろうしな！
それでは頼んだぞ、ハッハッハッハッハー！！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_115<tab>Yer not here on Ma'sh ordersh <var 1A 02 /var>again<var 1A 01 /var>, are ye? Hah, she'sh jusht as hardheaded as me.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_115<tab>……なに、またトレジャーハンターを辞めるよう説得にきたのか？
まったく、我が母も懲りないものだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_116<tab>Well, I'll tell ye same as lasht time─I'll only give up treashure huntin' when I find the richesh me pa died dreamin' of!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_116<tab>私は……浪漫を求めるトレジャーハンター！
一攫千金の夢をつかむまで、宝探しは辞められん！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_117<tab>But I got a lead. I were caroushin' lasht night, an' heard there'sh <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> treashure losht in Amdapor Keep, Pharos Siriush, an' the Tam<var 1F /var>Tara Deepcroft!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_117<tab>そうだ、今度こそ頼む！
「古城アムダプール」「シリウス大灯台」「タムタラの墓所」に
眠るお宝を見つけてくれないか！？

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_118<tab>I know ye already looked, but ye musht've jusht─hic!─misshed it the lasht time. But if ye can turn up me one an' only, then I'll quit thish life!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_118<tab>もしも、一攫千金の素晴らしいお宝が見つかれば、
私はトレジャーハンターを辞めよう！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_119<tab>Now leave me to me drink till ye've got coffersh full o' treashure with ye! Ahahaha!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_119<tab>それでは頼んだぞ！
ハッハッハッハッハッハッハー！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_130<tab>Me dreamsh will come true all for the losht richesh, me friend! Jusht think o' the grog the treashures will buy me!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_130<tab>冒険者よ、頼む！
「古城アムダプール」「シリウス大灯台」「タムタラの墓所」で、
眠れるお宝を持ち出してきてくれ！！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_150<tab><sniff> That shmell─it ain't the sweet scent o'─hic!─treashure, ish it?
target: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_150<tab>どうだ、お宝を3種、集めることはできたか！？

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_151<tab>Three coffersh─that'sh a wondroush sight, friend! Let me pry theshe open and shee what'sh inshide! I tellsh ye, I haven't been sho exshited for...
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_151<tab>……おお、さすがは私が見込んだ冒険者！
さっそく、中の品物を値踏みしようじゃあないか！
おったから、ざっくざく、うっれしっいなー！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_152<tab>Nothin'... What!? Thish...thish ain't nothin' but a bunch o' queer knickknacksh! What wrinkly scrote thought thish shite was worthy o' keepin' in a treashure coffer!?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_152<tab>………はぁんっ！！
気味の悪いガラクタしか入っていないじゃないかぁ！
誰だよ、金銀財宝が埋まってるって言ったの……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_153<tab>Ah well. Ol' Ealdwine don't get disheartened that eashily. Might be as I've got a trick up me shleeve. Shee, there'sh <var 1A 02 /var>another<var 1A 01 /var> losht treashure!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_153<tab>……しかぁし！　この不屈のハンサム、エルドワイン！！
これくらいでは心は折れん！
もう一箇所、財宝が眠るという噂を聞いた場所があるのだ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_154<tab>An' <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> are goin' to find it for me in the Shtone Vigil! I'd do it meshelf, but I've tired meshelf out from all thish shoutin'!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_154<tab>冒険者、もう一度だけ頼む！
「ストーンヴィジル」に行って、財宝を取ってきてくれ！！
今度の噂は信憑性が高い！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_161<tab>I've a good feelin' about thish time! Great richesh are callin' to me from─hic!─inshide theshe coffersh: open ush, open ush!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_161<tab>さすがは手練の冒険者！
今度こそ、ビンビン感じるぞ……大当たりの予感を！
さぁ、中を開けてみよう！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_162<tab>...Byregot'sh gut, theshe're filled with rubbish again. That bloke in the tavern'sh full o' shite. “Richesh so great I'd never have to work another day in me life”─hah!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_162<tab>……ダメだぁ、今回もゴミしか入ってない。
誰だよ、一生寝て暮らせる分のお宝があるって言ったの……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_163<tab>But I'm not─hic!─givin' up jusht like that. Ye've an idea o' why, don't ye?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_163<tab>……しかぁし！　この不屈のハンサム、エルドワイン！！
これくらいでは心は折れん！
冒険者、わかっているな！？

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_164<tab>There'sh another treashure in the Shtone Vigil! Now if ye nab it for me, ol' Ealdwine will never ask nothin' o' ye again'! ...If the coffer ish full.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_164<tab>もう一度だけ頼む！
今度は「ストーンヴィジル」に行って、
財宝を取ってきてくれ！！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_180<tab>Me friend, why aren't ye in the Shtone Vigil? If ye bring me the richesh─hic!─what'sh losht there, I'll deal ye a cut an' spend me days happily soushed in grog!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_180<tab>冒険者、もう一度だけ頼む！
「ストーンヴィジル」に行って、財宝を取ってきてくれ！！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_190<tab>Did ye find shomethin' in the Shtone Vigil, friend?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_190<tab>どうだ、「ストーンヴィジル」で、
お宝を手に入れることはできたか！？

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_191<tab>'Mazing bloody 'venturer, ye are! I can almosht tashte the treashure from here! Let'sh open her up, eh?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_191<tab>さすがは熟練の冒険者！
今度こそはビンビンと感じるぞ……お宝の予感を！
さあ、中を見てみようじゃあないか！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_192<tab>Knickknacksh...<var 1A 02 /var>again<var 1A 01 /var>!? <sniffle> And I was so shure that...I mean, the bloody losht treashure o' the Shtone Vigil!? Yearsh I've been at thish, an' for what?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_192<tab>………オイ。
これもガラクタの詰め合わせじゃないかぁ……。
ストーンヴィジルなら、って思ったのにぃ……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_193<tab>The Twelve're tellin' me shomethin', an' I'm bound to lishten. Their message ish loud an' clear: keep treashure huntin'!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_193<tab>……ふっ、まあいい。
きっと、天が私に言っているのだろう。
トレジャーハンターを辞めるべきではない、とな！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_194<tab>The more I─hic!─shtruggle now, the bigger me find will be. An' till I get me one an' only, there ain't no reashon to give up treashure huntin'! Shorry if ye were 'spectin' another anshwer, me friend.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_194<tab>そう、一攫千金のお宝が見つからなかった以上……
私がトレジャーハンターを辞める理由はない！
残念だったな、冒険者よ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_195<tab>Ah, don't shcrew up yer face like that. Ol' Ealdwine'll leave ye with a little shecret: tailor-made eel pie an' a piece o' perfect cloth. Give that pair to Ma, an' she'll give ye whatever ye wantsh!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_195<tab>……しかし、手伝ってくれたお前に、ヒントくらいはやる。
母には「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252C01 /var>」と「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252D01 /var>」を渡せばいい。
母ならそれで、交換条件に応じてくれるはずだ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_196<tab>Ma ain't so bad, even with the fusshin'. I know she'sh got me best intereshts at heart. She'sh jusht frettin' so I don't go the same way as Pa─may he resht in peace.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_196<tab>……母が私のことを心配しているのはわかっている。
だが、だからこそ、私は諦めるわけにはいかないのだ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_197<tab>Died chasin' dreamsh o' wealth, Pa did. I only became a treashure hunter to walk in his footshteps. I meansh to find everythin' he sought, an' make Ma happy along the way.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_197<tab>私の父も、トレジャーハンターだった。
夢半ばに死んだ父の、一攫千金の夢……！
私が成し遂げて、母に楽をさせてやりたいのだ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_198<tab>Well, now ye know why I can't shtop! Ahahaha, anyroad, might be as ye can make Ma'sh treatsh from shomethin' old in the Silver Bazaar. Now <var 1A 02 /var>I'm<var 1A 01 /var> off to the tavern─hic!─in search o' new treashure!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_198<tab>ああそうだ、製作に必要な素材の一部は、
シルバーバザーの流通品を、再利用するといいそうだぞ！
……それでは、さらばだ冒険者よ！　ハッハッハッハー！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_200<tab>Thish ish it! Thish ish the coffer what holdsh me untold richesh!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_200<tab>そうだ、これだ！
今度こそ……今度こそ一攫千金……！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_201<tab>...No, no, it don't. Byregot'sh buttock, why'sh it always junk an' refushe in theshe losht treashures?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_201<tab>………ダメだ。
今回も全部、ただのガラクタだぁ……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_202<tab>Well, ye 'member our deal─I ain't quittin' thish life till I've got me grand richesh.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_202<tab>つまり、トレジャーハンターは辞めっなーい！
ハズレだったのだからな、仕方がないことであろう！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_203<tab>But ye worked hard, so I'll give ye the same advice as last time: a tailor-made eel pie an' a piece o' perfect cloth are the keysh to Ma'sh heart.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_203<tab>まぁ、今回も我が母には、「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252C01 /var>」と
「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252D01 /var>」で、手を打ってもらうがいい。
毎度迷惑をかけて、すまんな。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_204<tab>Well, I'm off to find new treashure. I'll keep an eye out for ye on the road─long as I ain't shleepin' one off in the ditch, ahaha!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_EALDWINE_000_204<tab>……それでは、冒険者よ！
また旅路のどこかで会おうではないか！
ハーッハッハッハ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_250<tab>You were gone for quite a while, adventurer. Does that mean my son has come to his sens─ Eh? You have something to give me?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_250<tab>アンタ、息子は説得できたかい？
……おや、渡すものがあるって？

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_251<tab>Hehe, my favorite eel pie and some beautiful cloth for my needlework... And Ealdwine told you to get them, you say?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_251<tab>……そう、息子は説得に応じなかったの。
それで、代わりにこれを持ってけ、って言われたのね……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_252<tab>That son of mine, remembering what is dear to my heart! Hehe, he might not have too much betwixt the ears, but he has a good heart.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_252<tab>アタシの大好きなパイと、趣味のお裁縫に使う布だわ。
……フフ、気遣いなんてできない子だと思ってたけど、
アタシの好み、よくわかってるもんだわ……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_253<tab>My late husband was just the same, always chasing his dreams. Now, my son is the very same. Little wonder he is off on yet another treasure hunt.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_253<tab>亡くなった旦那も、夢ばっか追いかけるバカな男だったわ。
ほんと、そっくりに育っちゃったもんねぇ……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_254<tab>And deary me, I had you running about after him! Thank you for trying. I should say you have more than earned this crystal.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_254<tab>アンタには迷惑かけちゃったわね。
それじゃあ、約束のもの……「<var 28 ((Item)) F2252501 /var>」よ。
……アンタも、親孝行しなさいねぇ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_260<tab>Well, well, eel pie and some beautiful fabric. I suppose this means Ealdwine won't be giving up his treasure hunting?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_260<tab>あら、これは前回と同じ…………わかったわ。
今回も息子は、説得に応じなかったってことね……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_261<tab><sigh> He is truly his father's son, but I'll get him to stop chasing empty dreams someday.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_261<tab>まぁいいわ、息子が夢を諦めないのなら、
アタシだって諦めずに、説得し続けるまでよ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_262<tab>But that's my burden to bear. Here, have your alexandrite, and a mother's thanks.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_BRANGWINE_000_262<tab>そうだ、約束の「<var 28 ((Item)) F2252501 /var>」よぉ。
……アンタも、親孝行しなさいねぇ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>You have obtained all the necessary items to recreate a Zodiac Weapon. Report to Gerolt at Hyrstmill to proceed.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL014_00360_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>「ゾディアックウェポン」を再創造する準備が整いました。
ハーストミルに戻り、再創造に取りかかりましょう！
